channel.title: Special attacks
channel.description:
Okay i am sure there is like a hundred of these posts however i think mine has a bit more on it
I need to know
A.)How to put specials onto weapons (commonly asked)
And
B.)How to make it so that there is unlimited specs becasue i have nooooo clue how ive tried a lot of stuff but none if it
worked
Thanks And i really need this for my server because its a popular server but yeah...
